EmailTemplate.subject: Business Aviation Newsletter: September 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Business Aviation Newsletter: May 2015 Honeywell Offers 2014 Pricing, Incentives on Hawker Upgrades <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-offers-2014-pricing%2C-incentives-on-hawker-upgrades>
Honeywell is maintaining 2014 pricing on cockpit upgrades for the Hawker 800XP aircraft and providing installing dealers with a credit for each complete baseline configuration purchased by June 30, 2015. The goal of this promotion is to increase...
Continue Reading <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-offers-2014-pricing%2C-incentives-on-hawker-upgrades>
<http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=http%3A%2F%2Faerospace.honeywell.com%2Fnews%2Fhoneywell-offers-2014-pricing%252C-incentives-on-hawker-upgrades> <http://www.facebook.com/share.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Faerospace.honeywell.com%2Fnews%2Fhoneywell-offers-2014-pricing%252C-incentives-on-hawker-upgrades> <http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http%3A%2F%2Faerospace.honeywell.com%2Fnews%2Fhoneywell-offers-2014-pricing%252C-incentives-on-hawker-upgrades&text=Honeywell%20Offers%202014%20Pricing%2C%20Incentives%20on%20Hawker%20Upgrades>
Honeywell Avionics Help PC-24 Take Flight <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-avionics-help-pc-24-take-flight>
The “Swiss Dream” became reality May 11th when the Pilatus PC-24 Super Versatile Jet made its first flight, equipped with a fully integrated avionics system from Honeywell Aerospace. "It's another major milestone in the Pilatus and Swiss...

Newest Gulfstream Aircraft Flies with Honeywell Touch <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/newest-gulfstream-aircraft-flies-with-honeywell-touch>
The all-new Gulfstream G500 successfully completed its first flight on May 18 with an integrated flight deck from Honeywell onboard. According to a Gulfstream news release <http://gulfstreamnews.com/news/gulfstream-g500-completes-first-flight>, the company’s experimental test pilots checked all features of the Gulfstream...

Global Customer Committee Meetings Rock the RAILS <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/global-customer-committee-meetings-rock-the-rails>
The recent Global Customer Committee (GCC) <https://commerce.honeywell.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/CommitteeDisplayCmd?storeId=10651&segment=Business%20And%20General%20Aviation&committee=Global%20Customer%20Committee> face-to-face meeting in Phoenix, April 28-30, resulted in positive action on the Rolling Action Item List (RAIL) while stimulating open discussion on customer concerns as diverse as data analysis for No...

Honeywell Goes Virtual at EBACE 2015 <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-goes-virtual-at-ebace-2015>
Honeywell made a big impression at May’s European Business Aviation Convention & Exhibition (EBACE), thanks to an innovative virtual reality experience that exposed operators to the full breadth and depth of our business aviation product and services...

Turning an Air Force Falcon 900B into a Business Office <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-avionics-turn-air-force-falcon-900b-into-airborne-business-office>
A Falcon 900B belonging to a national air force in the Far East needed a major upgrade to enable government ministers and air force officers to stay in contact with colleagues and officials on the ground. RUAG Aviation of Switzerland―a leading...

Duncan, Honeywell Collaborate on STCs <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/duncan%2C-honeywell-collaborate-on-stcs>
Honeywell is working with Duncan Aviation to develop supplemental type certificates for Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/mandates-automatic-dependent-surveillance-broadcast> (ADS-B) solutions for the Honeywell Primus 1000/2000 and SPZ-8000 flight decks on multiple Hawker 800 series aircraft...
